item.title: Here’s how Trump can still defuse the ‘MAGA civil war’ over immigration
item.description: The Republican Party will have unified control of Washington starting next month, but fissures in the party’s coalition are already emerging even befo...

item.title: Apple’s been on an uncommonly strong run. So a tough January could now be in the cards.
item.description: History suggests investors should be “cautious” on Apple’s stock heading into January following its recent streak of weekly gains.

item.title: The second-season curse: Why Round 2 of ‘Squid Game’ may not be a winner for Netflix
item.description: The dystopian drama garnered an audience of 330 million in its first season, but experts warn that it’s not so easy to hit the ratings mark twice

item.title: This space stock registered its longest winning streak in five months
item.description: Small-cap stock Redwire ended Thursday’s session up 13.4%, registering its biggest one-day percentage gain since Nov. 11, 2024, when it rose 15.1%.

item.title: Treasury yields climb as 10-year caps off biggest 3-week advance in 2 years
item.description: Treasury yields ticked higher on Friday in thin holiday trade, with the 10-year just shy of its highest level in nearly eight months.
